nodes.bodyText: This is good, I think "records" works well in this context. FWIW, that's the term I found in the field to be most comfortable to users, who often think of "documents" as being things they create with Word and Powerpoint.
@rjrudin is the scope of this change marklogic-data-hub-central only?
That's really a question for @yasht2010 , but I'm pretty sure the answer is "yes".
I think we can say "entity" here, but "record" is still safe, as "record" is always a safe generalization.
